com.datasift.dropwizard.health
Class ZooKeeperQuorumHealthCheck

java.lang.Object
  com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
      com.datasift.dropwizard.health.ZooKeeperQuorumHealthCheck

public class ZooKeeperQuorumHealthCheck
extends HealthCheck

A HealthCheck for a quorum of ZooKeeper nodes.

Each node in the quorum is checked by its own ZooKeeperHealthCheck, but failures are grouped under the quorums' ZooKeeperQuorumHealthCheck.

TODO: find a way to actually report the reason for failed node healthchecks

check

protected HealthCheck.Result check()
                            throws Exception
Checks the health of the ZooKeeper quorum.

The health of the quorum is dictated by the health of the underlying nodes:

No failures:
Healthy
Partial failures:
Unhealthy (with message indicating partial failure of quorum)
Total failure:
Unhealthy (with message indicating total failure of quorum)

A partial failure is when some nodes in the quorum are unhealthy; a total failure, when all nodes are unhealthy.

Specified by:
check in class HealthCheck
Returns:
healthy if the entire quorum is healthy; unhealthy if any nodes in the quorum are unhealthy
Throws:
Exception - an unexpected error occurred while checking the health of the quorum

getUnhealthy

protected List<ZooKeeperHealthCheck> getUnhealthy()
Gets a List of the currently unhealthy nodes in the quorum.

Returns:
a List of unhealthy nodes in the quorum
